resources.string: Black Box Labs is a company founded in 2014 by a group of veteran QA specialists.

We provide solutions for companies that want to outsource their QA department but also for companies which need QA on short terms. Our goal is to establish long term relations with companies that develop games and applications.
Because we want to satisfy our clients needs we developed and we are constantly developing our procedures so that we can overcome any problems related to outsourcing.
The experience we have ranges from testing games on mobile platforms to creating scripts for automated testing.
B-dul Unirii nr.59, Bl B1, Focsani, Vrancea
